full_summary:
=====================================

### Agricultural Tractor Purchase

#### Tender Reference Number

* Solicitation Number: 5P300-23-0179/A
* Amendment Number: 3
* Reference Number: cb-435-98778765

#### Tender Opportunity

* Publication Date: November 12, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: November 28, 2023 at 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: December 4, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

#### Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering (Request for Proposal)
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contracting Entity

* Contracting Entity Name: Parks Canada
* Contracting Entity Address: 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, Quebec, J8X 0B3, Canada

#### Points of Contact

* Nicholas Moïse
	+ Telephone: (343) 585-4589
	+ Email: nicholas.moise@pc.gc.ca

#### Tender Description

Parks Canada requires the purchase of one (1) Agricultural Tractor. This bid solicitation process is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) E60HS-18AGTR/A. Suppliers can refer to [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/ws4153305060-doc4153316176) for more information on becoming a pre-qualified supplier.

The requested delivery date for the Agricultural Tractor is by March 31, 2024.

#### Debriefing

Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within fifteen (15) working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful. The debriefing may be provided in writing, by telephone or in person. 

---

**Important Note:** This announcement is a tender opportunity from the contracting agency, Parks Canada. Only suppliers who hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) E60HS-18AGTR/A are eligible to participate in this bid solicitation process.
